#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
  long t,a,b,l,x;
  long n;
  scanf("%ld",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
     
     cin>>a;          
     cin>>b;
     cin>>l;
   
            n=l%(a+b);
  
       if(n>0&&n<=a)
       {
         printf("Aman\n");
         }
       else
       {
         printf("Anish\n");
         }  
           
             
                         
       
     }
   return 0;
}
